message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the product for $14000. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love it!
Alice, $14000 is a bit steep for me. I'm interested in the product but I can only go up to $10000.  Let me know what you think.

Hi Bob, I understand your concerns, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer the product to you for $12000. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll be happy with the price. Let me know what you think!

Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $12000 is still a bit out of my range. I'm willing to pay $11000 for the product. If you're open to that, we can make a deal. Otherwise, I'm going to have to go with another option.

Hi Bob, I understand you're still a bit hesitant, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer the product to you for $11500. It's the lowest I'm willing to go, but I think it's still a fair price considering the product's value. Let me know if you're interested!
